entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bugs in `Console` members `KeyAvailable` and `ReadKey()` on Windows platform #102425
  • .NET 8 ComWrappers source generator doesn't handle _VTblGap* methods #102421
  • Why the D value of RSA is different #102418

Closed

  • System.Net.Http.HttpClient always fails on first attempted connection #95487
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [RISC-V] Fix few gcc build warnings for RISC-V #102426
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Delete empty DebugType property from test projects #102422
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • 2nd call to MemoryCache.Set() with the same key same size erases entry if cache is full #102420
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 125.0.6422.60, windows: 125.0.6422.60 #102417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add System.Formats.Sse #102238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete DebugSymbols=true setting for the repo build #102392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Enable RPO-based block layout by default #102343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • -p:DebugSymbols=false does not disable generation of .pdb files #41001
  • InvalidProjectFileException thrown for shared projects (.shproj) when doing a workload restore on Linux #41000

PullRequests

Created

  • [VMR] Update internal mac pool image label #40999
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Add await" should be upgraded to a codefix in presence of CS4014 #73576
  • Expose `SeparatedSyntaxList<T>.GetWithSeparators()` through interface #73575

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for or-pattern in `IDE0010` #73574
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Add the PR validation branch to publish data #73573
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • restore fails #55795
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #55794
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mvc, plainTextEmptyFilter #55793
  • Split MapIdentityApi<TUser>() into multiple APIs and allow selective end points to be enabled #55792
  • Blazor oidc doesn't return meaningfull error messages #55791
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55790
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55789
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext, updates #55788
  • Perf regression: https, mvc, plaintext #55787
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #55786
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries, plaintext #55785

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #55679
  • Perf regression: mvc #55776
  • Add a AddDefaultProblemDetailsFactory method that allows registering the internal `DefaultProblemDetailsFactory` class with the container #53030
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding multiple polylines to a Map messes up existing polyline #22510
  • I can't create maui apps #22509
  • [Android] CarouselView behaves strangely when swiping vertically in view #22507

Closed

  • [Windows] FlexLayout crashes when using a custom display scale factor value (regression) #22209
    .NET 8 SR6

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    community ✨

Merged

  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex

Updated

  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Make "IsConnected" public #22500
    community ✨, area-controls-general

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • No suitable constructor was found for entity type 'CollectionEntry' #33554
  • Exception when `SELECT`ing `(x ? A : default(int?) >= B)` #33752
  • Table splitting + ConcurrencyToken throws unexpected DBConcurrencyException #33750

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor improvement of `SqlServerParameterBasedSqlProcessor.Optimize` #33758
  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • Skip sync tests in Cosmos #33756
  • [TINY] Move all query translators into their own folders #33755
  • Remove invalid optimization of CASE-WHEN expressions #33754
